Hero.hero_description: An opportunity that will change many things. TemanDifa is here to support every step towards independence. We exist to be part of those who need it around you.

AboutSection.title: TemanDifa
AboutSection.description: TemanDifa was born out of concern for accessibility for people with disabilities, We believe that technology should be a bridge, not a barrier. By combining Artificial Intelligence, TemanDifa is here to make it easier for people with disabilities to do activities, learn, and communicate independently.

ProblemSection.subtitle: Background of the Problem
ProblemSection.global_stats_suffix: living with vision impairment ranging from low vision to total blindness.
ProblemSection.local_stats_suffix: visually impaired people, with a significant number of hearing impaired people as well. Many of them face major obstacles in daily independence.

Features.feature1_desc: Camera detects objects around the user instantly, helping to recognize the user's surroundings.
Features.feature2_desc: Scans documents or writing using the camera, then converts it into text or voice so users can immediately hear the document content.
Features.feature3_desc: Converts voice to text so hearing-impaired users can follow conversations
Features.feature4_desc: Provides an option to connect with volunteers ready to help directly via video call

ClosingHero.description: An app designed to empower people with disabilities to explore the world with confidence - becoming their eyes, ears, and assistant.

Footer.tagline: See with confidence, Hear clearly, Be help when needed.
